thread.title: Linda Levi
thread.title_full: Easy Comforts reviewed by Linda Levi

author: Linda Levi
title: Linda Levi
text: Without Easy Comforts I would not have received excellent products, like the bissell featherweight vacuum, and the easy to put together shelf which fits perfect in my linen closet and all the other fine things I purchased through the years. Before I was buying items that my elderly Mother could use, it pleases me to find items I too need. The memory foam mattress was a small disapointment, however because I had extra foam already, it did add comfort for me. But is is not 3 inches of foam, more like 1".
